ai-sn30:1.1.2_0: “Mendicants, phoenixes reproduce in these four ways.
ai-sn30:1.1.4_0: Phoenixes are born from eggs, from a womb, from moisture, or spontaneously.
ai-sn30:1.1.5_0: These are the four ways that phoenixes reproduce.”
ai-sn30:2.1.2_0: “Mendicants, phoenixes reproduce in these four ways.
ai-sn30:2.1.4_0: Phoenixes are born from eggs, from a womb, from moisture, or spontaneously.
ai-sn30:2.1.5_0: These are the four ways that phoenixes reproduce.
ai-sn30:2.1.6_0: Of these, phoenixes born from an egg can only carry off dragons born from an egg, not those born from a womb, from moisture, or spontaneously.
ai-sn30:2.1.7_0: Of these, phoenixes born from an egg can only carry off dragons born from an egg, not those born from a womb, from moisture, or spontaneously.
ai-sn30:2.1.8_0: Phoenixes born from moisture can carry off dragons born from an egg, from a womb, or from moisture, but not those born spontaneously.
ai-sn30:2.1.9_0: Phoenixes born spontaneously can carry off dragons born from an egg, from a womb, from moisture, or spontaneously.
ai-sn30:2.1.10_0: These are the four ways that phoenixes reproduce.”
ai-sn30:3.1.2_0: he went to the Fortunate One,
ai-sn30:3.1.3_0: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the egg-born phoenixes?”
ai-sn30:3.1.6_0: ‘The egg-born phoenixes are long-lived, beautiful, and very happy.’
ai-sn30:3.1.8_0: ‘If only, when my body breaks up, after death, I would be reborn in the company of the egg-born phoenixes!’
ai-sn30:3.1.9_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the company of the egg-born phoenixes.
ai-sn30:3.1.10_0: This is the cause, this is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the egg-born phoenixes.”
ai-sn30:4-6.1.3_0: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the womb-born phoenixes?
ai-sn30:4-6.1.8_0: ‘The Holy One is long-lived, beautiful, and very happy.’
ai-sn30:4-6.1.10_0: ‘If only, when my body breaks up, after death, I would be reborn in the company of the spontaneously-born phoenixes!’
ai-sn30:4-6.1.11_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the company of the phoenixes.
ai-sn30:4-6.1.12_0: This is the cause, this is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the spontaneously-born phoenixes.”
ai-sn30:4-6.1.13_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
ai-sn30:7-16.0.3_0: Ten Discourses On How Giving Helps to Become a Follower

ai-sn30:7-16.1.6_0: ‘The egg-born phoenixes are long-lived, beautiful, and very happy.’
ai-sn30:7-16.1.8_0: ‘If only, when my body breaks up, after death, I would be reborn in the company of the egg-born phoenixes!’
ai-sn30:7-16.1.19_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the company of the egg-born phoenixes.
ai-sn30:7-16.1.20_0: This is the cause, this is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the egg-born phoenixes.”
ai-sn30:17-46.0.3_0: Turning wood from the tips of the Bodhi Tree
ai-sn30:17-46.1.3_0: “Sir, what is the cause, what is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the womb-born phoenixes?
ai-sn30:17-46.1.8_0: ‘The Holy One is long-lived, beautiful, and very happy.’
ai-sn30:17-46.1.10_0: ‘If only, when my body breaks up, after death, I would be reborn in the company of the spontaneously-born phoenixes!’
ai-sn30:17-46.1.14_0: When their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in the company of the phoenixes.
ai-sn30:17-46.1.15_0: This is the cause, this is the reason why someone, when their body breaks up, after death, is reborn in the company of the spontaneously-born phoenixes.”
ai-sn30:17-46.1.16_0: The group of four is finished.
ai-sn30:17-46.1.17_0: In this way the discourses were like this.
ai-sn30:17-46.1.18_0: The first sub-chapter on phoenixes is finished.
ai-sn30:17-46.2.5_0: The Linked Discourses on phoenixes are complete.
